doc:
O. Z. Whitehead https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/O._Z._Whitehead 0 Oothout Zabriskie Whitehead (March 1, 1911 – July 29, 1998) was a stage and film character actor. He was born in New York City and attended Harvard University. Called "O.Z." or "Zebby", he also authored several volumes of biographical sketches of early members of the Bahá'í Faith especially in the West after he moved ("pioneered" as a Bahá'í) to Dublin, Ireland in 1963. Oothout_Zabriskie_Whitehead ( March_1_,_1911 – July_29_,_1998 ) was a_stage_and_film_character_actor . He was_born in New_York_City and attended Harvard_University . Called " O.Z.
